data.actual_result: in overlay, some roles are missing, sometimes you can't removes some roles from the member (depends of which roles has someone) and sometimes roles that are above your higher role will appear
data.expected_result: you should see the same roles in the list in both cases
data.short_description: when in overlay and try to give roles to a member, the list doesn't show all the roles, sometimes shows roles that are above your higher role and you can't remove roles from a member if that role doesn't appear in the list
data.steps_to_repro: - in a game (tested in osu, minecraft, rayman origins and TBOIA+) open the overlay - make sure that you are in a server you didn't create, you don't own and has over 12 roles - you need to have either admin perms or manage roles perms - make sure to not update nor change perms of any role while the game is open - click on a user that has only 1 or 2 roles - click "+" to add more roles - observe how many roles there are in the list and wich ones - close the game, go to the same server and repeat steps 5, 6 and 7 with the same member
